author: Michael Lecuona
comment: The background changes, but it doesn't match the sunrise and sunset of the area you are in. Sunset was at 6pm, but background didn't switch to night until 9pm. A step counter display would be nice too
title: Nice graphics but background change isnt right

author: Tudor
comment: Simple and awesome, good work. Thanks for listening and providing 12 hour format! Looking forward to more updates

author: Jonathan Kuykendall
comment: *Updated* I stand corrected. Thank you for the 12 hour format. It's now my favorite face.

reply.author: alias apps
reply.content:
12 hour option now available with the latest update as well as other dim mode options.  Thanks for the review! 
Mike

title: Fix the 24 Hours

author: Nick Chinnick
comment: It just needs a 12 hour format option but I'm still using it for the moment even though it takes me a minute longer to know the time in the afternoon

reply.author: alias apps
reply.content:
Update:
12 hour format now available with latest release. 

Hi Nick, thanks for purchasing the app and the great review. It seems like a lot of users would like the 12 hour format option. I will make this update in the coming days and push the new version.

Thanks again!
Mike

title: Most amazing watch face

author: Steven Weaner
comment: I am using an LG G watch, and the time is not centered, cutting out part of the time. I love what it looks like, I just wish this would be fixed.

reply.author: alias apps
reply.content:
Watch face has been fixed. It should become available for you to update within a few hours. Please email us if the problem still exists support@aliasapps.com
Thanks for the review and purchase! 
-Mike

title: Watch face not centered

author: Hex DSL
comment: Love it and will be using it daily but it needs a 24/12 hour toggle.  An option to hide the hearts in ambient or at least make them black and white.

reply.author: alias apps
reply.content:
12 hour option available with latest release.  Thanks for the feedback! 



Thanks for the review! We will definitely keep these updates in mind when releasing the next update for this watch face.

title: Really great but....

author: Arik Licholat
comment: And the option to display the date in dimmed mode.

reply.author: alias apps
reply.content:
App has been updated to include your feedback. Thanks! 



Thanks for the feedback. We are working on an update and will include these along with other feedback we have received. 

Many thanks!

title: Needs 12 hour support

author: Rasmus Rask
comment: The retro looking 8-bit design is great for game lovers or anyone looking for a pixel styled watchface. The hearts showing the watches battery are particularily outstanding!

reply.author: alias apps
reply.content: Thanks for the great review! Glad you like it.

title: Love the design

author: illCircleTV
comment: Nice work on this, get a lot of compliments
title: This watch face is hot
